'''Varamyr''', called '''Varamyr Sixskins''', is a character that will debut in the [[Season 5|fifth season]]. He is a [[warg]] and a member of the [[Free Folk]].
sections.In the books: In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' books, Varamyr is a small, grey-faced and bald man with round shoulders. He is a skinchanger who controls a snow bear, a [[shadowcat]] and three wolves, later taking control of [[Orell]]'s eagle after the latter's death. Though physically weak, Varamyr is feared among the Free Folk, with a dozen villages paying him homage and even sending him women whenever he desired. He's among the the prominent wildlings that [[Mance Rayder]] seeks to form an alliance with.
